description: This route is along the shore of the Vanouver Harbour, from Waterfront to Stanley Park No. 19 bus terminus stop,it passes Canada Place,and Vancouver Convention Centre.You can see seabus, seaplanes and helicopters.Along the shore of the route you can see beautiful Vancouver Habour ,the North Vancouver and the mountin standing around the Habour .
directions: Vancouver downtown Waterfront,almost every bus and skytrain can reach here.
title: canada place to stanley park route
